Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers
Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers

Photographs on paper of "Maria del Bosco" cartoon narrative and of Richard Foreman in front of a "Luogo + Bersaglio" banner in Italy. Auctioned as part of a benefit for the Ontological-Hysteric Theatre.
